thread.title: Prep profile: Manitowoc Lincoln’s Cassidy Mrotek
thread.title_full: Prep profile: Manitowoc Lincoln’s Cassidy Mrotek

title: Prep profile: Manitowoc Lincoln’s Cassidy Mrotek
text:
Prep profile: Manitowoc Lincoln’s Cassidy Mrotek Tom Dombeck , HTR Media 7:42 p.m. CDT October 5, 2015 Cassidy Mrotek is featured in this week's HTR Media Prep Profile Manitowoc Lincoln senior outside hitter Cassidy Mrotek, 17, waves to fans and supporters at JFK Fieldhouse Thursday. (Photo: Yi-Chin Lee/HTR Media) 
Volleyball, gymnastics, track and field 
All-time team sports achievement 
Going to State junior year. 
All-time individual achievement 
Play volleyball in college. 
Cassidy’s thoughts 
“I thought we’ve done a good job this season, we’re stepping up to the plate showing people we can do what we can do. We’re all friends on the court so that helps out. Individually, I feel like I’ve done what I can to to help the team.” 
Coach Mary Beth Dixon’s thoughts 
“Cassidy’s done a great job. She’s had some matches that are better than others but her last two, Tuesday and Thursday night have been awesome. She’s had a real good game in the kill category and dig category. My expectations are for everyone to be at peak performance, same thing with Cassidy. She listens, she’s very coachable. She’s always looking to improve which is important.” 
Cassidy’s favorites 
•Pro/college athlete: Wisconsin volleyball player Kelli Bates 
•Pro/college team: Wisconsin Badgers 
•Musical artist or group: Luke Bryan 
•Song of all time: “This is how we roll” by Florida Georgia Line 
•TV show: “Chicago Fire” 
•Class: Anatomy and physiology 
•Food: Pizza 
•Saying or piece of advice: “Not for the love of the fame, but for the love of the game.” 
•Hobby: Sports 
What if ... 
•You could be any celebrity on earth for a week. Who would it be? Blake Lively 
•You could listen to a song minutes before the biggest athletic event of your life to get you hyped. What would it be? “Till I collapse” by Eminem and Nate Dogg 
•You could meet one famous person, a non-athlete, who would it be? Scott Eastwood 
Quick Q&A 
•Who inspires you most? My sister. 
•What is your dream vacation destination? Hawaii 
•Who’s the toughest opponent you have ever faced? Neenah 
•What’s your No. 1 pet peeve? Slow drivers. 
•What do you want to do for a living? Physical therapy 
•Why are sports important to you? It teaches you life lessons. 
•What’s your strength as a person? I’m determined, strong willed and funny. 
•What do you still need to work on? Staying positive. 
•Do you have any pre-game rituals? Jam out. 
•Top person you follow, or would follow, on Twitter? Carley Braun 
FIND IT ONLINE 
For a video of this week’s Prep Profile by HTR Media sports reporter Tom Dombeck, visit www.htrnews.com/sports Read or Share this story: http://htrne.ws/1RrBq4E TOP VIDEOS
